text: I had no idea this game existed until a few weeks before its release. It's been getting stellar reviews so I'll surely be playing it. It seems to draw inspiration from Planescape Torment while also doing its own thing, I've always liked a good detective game. The writing and the world building seem especially well realised, with tons of replay value depending on the choices in skills you make. This theme is super pleasant, makes me feel like a Sunday morning.
author: SupraDarky

text:
This game deserves the hype.
Right from the start it will hook you. Buy it as soon as you can, wont regret it
author: Gustavo Lima

text:
You should post a Yume Nikki one, that game has a OST that catch the ambience of the sections in it. The best examples are Snow World, Barracks Settlement, Block World and Tile Passage.

The same with Battle for Bikini Bottom, that game is the Nickelodeon videogame with the best OST along with supersponge. The ones i  reccomend you are Spongebob's Dream, Industrial Park, Final Boss and Rock Bottom.

Not forcing you but it would be good from your part.
author: la bodega de super jux
